name: calculate-extra-azure-devops-variables
description: Calculate extra Azure Devops variables. Use these variables in the same way as you use the [Azure DevOps predefined variables](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/build/variables)
helpMarkDown:
Calculates these extra variables:
- `EXTRAVARIABLES_ACTIVESPRINT`: Contains the name of the sprint that was active at the time of commit.
    - **Note:** Value will be `null` when there's no sprint active, or when multiple sprints are active at the time of commit.
author: Floris Devreese
